description:
Raise the safety bar a little higher this winter. BCA’s safety-focused Float E2 35L is your counterpart for day tours. Employing an electronic airbag system, this innovative design allows rapid and repeatable deployments of the float system in the event of an avalanche. You can haul up skis in diagonal attachment, or vertical snowboard carry and Its purpose-built snow safety pocket holds your probe, shovel, and snow study kit.

  • Durable 420-denier ripstop nylon fabric stands up to snow, ice, rocks and gear
  • Alpride E2 supercapacitator system for powerful and repeatable airbag deployment in the event of an avalanche
  • High-speed supercapacitor rapidly inflates the airbag without the need for heavy canisters
  • Snow safety pocket holds probe, shovel and snow study kit
  • Side Stash pocket and Back Stash zip make it easier today access gear on the move
  • Adjustable sternum strap reduces strain through the shoulders
  • YKK Zippers with DWR coating
  • Hipbelt pocket
  • Deployment system recharges with 2 AA batteries or USB
name: Backcountry Access Float E2 35L Avalanche Bag - Unisex
